amendatorysection.chaptername: Cities And Villages; Laws Applicable To All
amendatorysection.catchline: Musical and amusement organizations; rules and regulations.
amendatorysection.para: The city council of each such city, or village board of each such village, making provision for any vocal, instrumental or amusement organization, shall make and adopt all suitable and necessary rules, regulations, and bylaws concerning the government, organization, expenditures, and other necessary matters pertaining to such organization, and for that purpose shall appoint and designate three members of the city council or village board as a committee on municipal amusements and entertainments.
